title: Honeymoon from Hell VI
description: Finally, after all these years Marybeth was finally his and he was going to do whatever it took to keep her, even if that meant risking it all.Along with their Honeymoon from Hell has been added "What Really Happened.." the story of how Darrin and Marybeth finally came together. They will be released in Chronicle form on the website in the next few weeks, but are published as a collection in this novelette.
author: R.L. Mathewson
